snippet: In a live video, a young woman showed off a purse and a driver’s license that weren’t her own. Less than a month later, she was charged in a string of bar thefts.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes how arrest of Shaniah Lord in Manhattan on grand larceny charges was preceded by Facebook Live video that seems to show 19-year-old showing off stolen property; Lord is accused of number of thefts from patrons at various Manhattan bars; notes Lord's sister says Facebook posts, which attempted to portray a glamorous life were, in retrospect, cry for help.
